title: FUNCTIONS view (Account Usage and Information Schema): New column IS_AGGREGATE | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_06 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the Account Usage and Information Schema FUNCTIONS view includes the following new column(s):

YES if the function is an aggregate function;
otherwise, NO.
